inclusion.criterion: hysterectomy with or without concomitant procedures
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: known history of urinary tract anomaly
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Premeditated urologic procedure during hysterectomy surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 78 year-old male with history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. Has low urine output but good post-void bladder scans.
